VIII.iv.2.B.4.b
.
Record Group 319, Records of the Army Staff
The NARA Military Reference Branch has custody of
Record Group 319
,
Records of the Army Staff
, which contains paper records for American FPOWs of the KC and includes lists of the names of allies exchanged with the communists.
Volume 1
lists locations of POW camps identified by number and location, and
includes 140 pages of American FPOWs listed by name, service number, rank, unit and camp number, and
Volume 2 includes supplemental lists of both military and civilian prisoners of various nationalities.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
